tool_description: Find the GST NUMBER or GSTIN of a registered company just by name or PAN number.
name: GST Number Search by Name or PAN
title: GST Number Search by Name or PAN
tool_name: GST Number Search by Name or PAN

api_list.name: Get GST details
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://gst-number-search-by-name-or-pan.p.rapidapi.com/GstSearchNamePan"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "gst-number-search-by-name-or-pan.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
